# `SignInWithProviderOptions`

```ts
type SignInWithProviderOptions =
  | { provider: 'workos'; options: CommonProviderOptions & WorkOsOptions }
  | { provider: Exclude<Provider, 'workos'>; options: CommonProviderOptions }
```
